title: Are we about to become batteries for AI? A 2030 thought experiment on work, energy and human worth
summary_full: With 80 per cent of jobs gone and work no longer anchoring daily life, the body may become the last remaining asset. In one imagined 2030, people generate electricity through exercise, turning gym floors into power plants and physical effort into infrastructure, sustaining the very AI systems that rendered their previous roles obsolete.
